column1: Smoque BBQ////I get the 1/2 and 1/2 sandwich with brisket and pork. It is fantastic every time. This place is out in the middle of nowhere so we've always driven
column2: which is probably your best bet. The cornbread is also good and the slaw is great- not too sweet
column3: which is what I like. I probably won't make it out to Smoque as much since my office moved down to the loop
column4: and I will lament that for the rest of time.
